div.p: Two exemplary cases (square R=10, circle R=50) are simulated in Simulink, implementing a control system that ramps down Î½ if the danger level is reached. Row ( a, b) different realizations of the process (thin lines, grey and red in the safety and danger zones, respectively) and the two extreme realizations in terms of first passage time (thick grey lines) with their associated quasi-steady deterministic bifurcation diagrams (blue lines). ( c, d) KDE of the PDFs. The mean residence and mean released energy in the danger zone are also indicated.
